0.question: Donna made 5 posters. Elizabeth made twice as many posters as Donna. They hung up 7 posters. How many posters do they have left?

1.question: Mr. Sanchez baked 4 muffins. Mrs. Sanchez baked twice as many muffins. They sold 7 muffins. How many muffins were left?

2.question: Kim took 6 pictures. Michael took twice as many pictures. How many pictures did they take together?

3.question: Gail made 3 snowballs. Luis made twice as many snowballs. How many snowballs did they make together?

4.question: John built 5 birdhouses. Eddie built twice as many as John. They sold 9 birdhouses. How many were left?
